data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Namakkal, Tamil Nadu, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Namakkal, Tamil Nadu, India

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Namakkal words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Namakkal to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, it’s possible most of the 1,686,658 lost people in  Namakkal, Tamil Nadu, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Ambalavasi Tottiyan Naicker people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Namakkal, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Namakkal, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the county of Namakkal, Tamil Nadu, India has a population of 1,726,600.

We estimate Namakkal has 18,993 people who might know Jesus, 20,949 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,686,658 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Namakkal unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

location.name: Namakkal
location.people_groups_list: Devendrakulathan, Ambalavasi Kambalattu, Kollakar, Thantapulayan, Vanniyan Kotton
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Devendrakulathan (87,000), Ambalavasi Kambalattu (2,900), Kollakar (1,700), Thantapulayan (5,200), Vanniyan Kotton (16,000)
